com.percussion.cas
Class PSFixAssemblyUrlForRevision

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.extension.PSDefaultExtension
      com.percussion.cas.PSFixAssemblyUrlForRevision
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSExtension, IPSResultDocumentProcessor
public class PSFixAssemblyUrlForRevision
extends PSDefaultExtension
implements IPSResultDocumentProcessor

This exit is intended to corrrect the related link URLs in assembly XML document for last public revision and typically goes onto a authtype implementation resource, for example, sys_casSupport/casSupport_1 or any custom authtype resource that needs corrections for tha last public revision. It takes two optional parameters:

  1. Name of the element in the result XML document whose value represents of the link URL to be corrected for last public revision. If the name specifed starts with "@", then the link URL is taken from any element that has an attribute with that name. Default is linkurl
  2. A flag ("yes" or "no" or "true" or "false") to instruct that the link element has to be removed from the document if the related item never went to public.
  3. Content Valid flag string which is a comma separated list of content valid flags, (e.g. i,x) for revision correction. If the current state of the item has a content valid flag matching one of these then the revision is corrected otherwise the URL is not modifed.

No exception is thrown in case of any processing error, instead the message is logged to server log as well as application trace.

fixRelatedContentUrl

public static String fixRelatedContentUrl(IPSRequestContext request,
                                          String relatedContentUrl,
                                          boolean nullIfNeverPublic,
                                          String contentValidString)
                                   throws PSInternalRequestCallException,
                                          com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException,
                                          com.percussion.server.PSRequestParsingException
Fix the revision parameter in the supplied related content URL for public revision. The contentid of the related item is parsed from the supplied URL. The following scheme is used to corerct teh URL:

  • If the URL does not have a contentidparameter, then the URL is returned as it is.
  • Existence of revision revision parameter in the URL is checked and if it does not have revision parameter at all then the the URL is returned unmodified.
  • If the item was ever gone public then the revision parameter in the URL will be replaced with tha last public revision.
  • If the item was never gone public and the the nullIfNeverPublic option is (third argument to this method) true, then the return value will be null
  • If the item was never gone public and the the nullIfNeverPublic option is (third argument to this method) false, then URL will be returned unmodified.

Parameters:
request - the request used to make internal lookups, must not be null.
relatedContentUrl - the related content url string that will be fixed, must not be null.
nullIfNeverPublic - flag to indicate to return null if the item was never gone public.
contentValidString - string which is a comma separated list of content valid flags, (e.g. i,x) for revision correction. Must not be null or empty.
Returns:
the fixed related content url, null if this url should be skipped.
Throws:
PSInternalRequestCallException - for errors caused doing internal lookups.
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException - if a required resource is not found while making lookup requests.
com.percussion.server.PSRequestParsingException
